title: North-South Line and East-West Line disruption

updates.text: [NSEWL] CLEARED: SMRT has successfully launched trains from Bishan Depot. Train services on North-South Line and East-West Line has resumed back to normal service.

[NSEWL]: Please expect longer intervals between trains of about 3.5 minutes on NSEWL during this evening's peak hours. Crowded trains are expected. Commuters are advised to take alternative lines or other modes of transport to continue their journey. We apologise for any
[NSL] Update: The NSEWL train service has returned to normal. Free regular bus and bridging bus services have ceased. We thank you for your understanding and patience.

For alt. travel options, please refer to the link here. https://t.co/EEiVzwLMv1 1. Select the line you wish to find out on alternative travel. 2. Select the station 3. Click on "Alternative Travel Information"

[NSL] UPDATE: Pls expect a longer waiting time of up to 5 minutes for NSEWL train services due to an engineering vehicle fault. Free regular bus & bridging bus services are available between Bishan & Woodlands. Pax are advised to use TEL or CCL. Train service is still available.

For alternative travel options, please refer to the link here. https://t.co/EEiVzwLMv1 1. Select the line you wish to find out on alternative travel. 2. Select the station 3. Click on "Alternative Travel Information"
